channel.title: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion
channel.description: I am trying to get my 317 client to work with the Hyperion, but I cannot get it to accept the login block opcode, it keeps coming up invalid, [code] Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 9399 object definitions. Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1166825 objects. Dec 05, 2011 4:47:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 7956 definitions. Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Ready Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 28 Dec 05, 2011 4:47:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 0 Dec 05, 2011 4:47:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 73 [/code] I have been trying to edit the RS2LoginDecoder class to fit the client, (I even changed all the return false statements to return true just for a test, i didn't work) I am not good with login protocol, if you have a link to teach me this, that would be nice :) But I would rather this be answered.

item.title: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Yes, I got this deob client from Medorphins developers kit, it was still in the .jar.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion

item.title: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I’m sure you smart enough to know this, but they are definitely the same revisions (client/server)?

Read full topic

item.title: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I am trying to get my 317 client to work with the Hyperion, but I cannot get it to accept the login block opcode, it keeps coming up invalid,

Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.Server main
INFO: Starting Hyperion...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loading definitions...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43595...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 8080...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start
INFO: Ready
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43594...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init>
INFO: Loading scripts...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loaded 9399 object definitions.
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loading map...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start
INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loaded 1166825 objects.
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions...
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init
INFO: Loaded 7956 definitions.
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start
INFO: Ready
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:19 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 28
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 0
Dec 05, 2011 4:47:23 PM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode
INFO: Invalid login block opcode : 73

I have been trying to edit the RS2LoginDecoder class to fit the client, (I even changed all the return false statements to return true just for a test, i didn’t work) I am not good with login protocol, if you have a link to teach me this, that would be nice But I would rather this be answered.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my 317 deob client compatabile with this Hyperion
